description: This header file provides function declarations and includes related to Zigbee IAS Zone handling, such as zone status change handling, resource fetching and registration, and helper functions for zone type naming and trouble resource retrieval.

methods.name: iasZoneStatusChangedHelper
methods.description: Handles the event when the zone status changes, updating resources accordingly based on IAS Zone specifications.

methods.name: iasZoneFetchInitialResourceValues
methods.description: Fetches and initializes resource values for a given IAS Zone device, optionally targeting specific endpoints.

methods.name: iasZoneRegisterResources
methods.description: Registers resources for a device endpoint related to IAS Zone, creating necessary resources for IAS Zone server clusters.

methods.name: iasZoneHelperGetZoneTypeName
methods.description: Returns the string name corresponding to a given zone type code.

methods.name: iasZoneHelperGetTroubleResource
methods.description: Returns the resource name indicating trouble status for a device based on its class and zone type name.
